planEvaluations.name: Simple Furniture Assembly
planEvaluations.prompt: I want to assemble an IKEA Malm bed frame with headboard. I have a 12x15 foot bedroom with good lighting and power available. My budget is $100. I don't have any tools. Workers can access my apartment with a key code. I need this done within a week.

totalHours.reasoning: Basic furniture assembly typically takes 2-4 hours

totalCost.reasoning: Should fit within $100 budget, accounting for tool rental if needed

taskCount.reasoning: Should include preparation, assembly, and quality check tasks

evaluationCriteria: Plan includes space preparation if workspace is limited
Cost estimates are realistic for the market

planEvaluations.name: Complex Deck Construction
planEvaluations.prompt: I need to build a 12x16 foot wooden deck with stairs in my backyard. The backyard is accessible through a gate. I have a $3000 budget. The project needs to comply with local building codes. I want it completed within 2 weeks. The ground is level and there's good access for materials.

totalHours.reasoning: Deck construction is a complex project requiring significant time

totalCost.reasoning: Materials and labor for deck construction typically cost $2000-3500

taskCount.reasoning: Complex construction projects have many subtasks

planEvaluations.name: Kitchen Backsplash Installation
planEvaluations.prompt: I want to install a subway tile backsplash in my kitchen. The area is 3 feet high and 8 feet wide. I have power tools available. The kitchen is on the first floor with easy access. My budget is $500. I need this done within 3 days.

totalHours.reasoning: Tile installation requires precision and time for proper setting

totalCost.reasoning: Materials and labor for tile backsplash typically cost $300-600

taskCount.reasoning: Tile installation has several distinct phases

evaluationCriteria: Plan accounts for tile cutting and layout
Curing time is considered in timeline

executeEvaluations.name: Task Execution Flow
executeEvaluations.description: Test the execution flow and task state management

completedTasks.reasoning: Should complete most tasks in the plan

evaluationCriteria: All tasks transition through proper states

executeEvaluations.name: Interactive Execution
executeEvaluations.description: Test interactive task selection and modification

userInteractions.reasoning: Should prompt user for task selection and modifications

taskModifications.reasoning: User may choose to modify some tasks

evaluationCriteria: User can select which task to execute next
User can modify task estimates during execution
User can skip tasks during execution
User can add new tasks during execution
